changeSet.author: iiu@adorsys.com.ua
changeSet.comment: Remove tpp_info_id foreign key from ais_consent, pis_common_payment and piis_consent tables

changeSet.author: iiu@adorsys.com.ua
changeSet.comment: Update tpp_info_id in ais_consent, pis_common_payment, piis_consent and tpp_info_role
changeSet.sql: UPDATE ais_consent a SET tpp_info_id = (SELECT n.new_tpp_info_id FROM tpp_info t INNER JOIN (SELECT MIN(tpp_info_id) AS new_tpp_info_id, authorisation_number FROM tpp_info GROUP BY authorisation_number) n ON t.authorisation_number = n.authorisation_number WHERE a.tpp_info_id = t.tpp_info_id);

UPDATE pis_common_payment p SET tpp_info_id = (SELECT n.new_tpp_info_id FROM tpp_info t INNER JOIN (SELECT MIN(tpp_info_id) AS new_tpp_info_id, authorisation_number FROM tpp_info GROUP BY authorisation_number) n ON t.authorisation_number = n.authorisation_number WHERE p.tpp_info_id = t.tpp_info_id);

UPDATE piis_consent p SET tpp_info_id = (SELECT n.new_tpp_info_id FROM tpp_info t INNER JOIN (SELECT MIN(tpp_info_id) AS new_tpp_info_id, authorisation_number FROM tpp_info GROUP BY authorisation_number) n ON t.authorisation_number = n.authorisation_number WHERE p.tpp_info_id = t.tpp_info_id);

UPDATE tpp_info_role r SET tpp_info_id = (SELECT n.new_tpp_info_id FROM tpp_info t INNER JOIN (SELECT MIN(tpp_info_id) AS new_tpp_info_id, authorisation_number FROM tpp_info GROUP BY authorisation_number) n ON t.authorisation_number = n.authorisation_number WHERE r.tpp_info_id = t.tpp_info_id);

changeSet.author: iiu@adorsys.com.ua
changeSet.comment: Delete non-unique records in tpp_info table
changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM tpp_info WHERE tpp_info_id NOT IN (SELECT MIN(tpp_info_id) AS tpp_info_id FROM tpp_info GROUP BY authorisation_number)

changeSet.author: iiu@adorsys.com.ua
changeSet.comment: Set redirect_uri, nok_redirect_uri, cancel_redirect_uri, cancel_nok_redirect_uri in tpp_info table to NULL
changeSet.sql: UPDATE tpp_info SET redirect_uri = NULL, nok_redirect_uri = NULL, cancel_redirect_uri = NULL, cancel_nok_redirect_uri = NULL
